title: Champion Select Loads Slowly
body:
Since the last patch my champion select screens have been loading very slowly. I have seen a couple other posts about this but nothing that has been replied to. It started the day of the patch. Does anyone know a fix or is also having issues with this?

I have tried repairing the client, no luck. Might uninstall and reinstall it later, see if that helps. Also been getting very small lag spikes in game, might be my own network though, and it hasn't been happening as much the last couple of games.

Thanks for any help and suggestions in advance!

replies.body: I have been having this same exact issue.... its a black screen for 10-30 seconds and then loads properly
Loading slowly as in, takes a few seconds? Or are you seeing a black screen in champ select that causes you to get kicked out of the room?

I get a black screen for like 10-30 seconds before the champion select loads up properly. Sometimes the bar on the right hand side of the screen is grayed out, sometimes I can click things on it.

I have not had it just not load up, but it always takes a long time to load. The issue has not caused me to get kicked out of a room.

Gotcha. There was a known issue causing this behavior in the Beta Client, but we deployed a hotfix for it last night that should have resolved it. Please let me know if you're still experiencing this.

Thank you, I am at work now but I will test it when I get home.

EDIT: Just loaded into a game, did not have the issue.
I made a 2 min vid about this. I found a very easy solution. Please give it a like if it helped u guys :D https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=95lrsWnhDSA

I switched back to the legacy client and am not having the delayed issue as I was having on the new client... try restoring your clients from the alpha to legacy (I know alpha looks much better but it helped me fix the issue)

I got the same issue as you. I accept a match, and when everyone has accepted and I should go to the champion select, I see only a black screen and the chat selection right to it. After 10-30 seconds, it's OK, but is too long...

Me too. I almost get a leave buster. Accept match then don't get into champ select till nearly 1 or bans are already done. It only started happening in the last patch 7.4. Very stressful cuz if I am first ban i can get leave buster.
I have been doing blind, but my black screens haven't lasted that long. If I were doing draft it would probably last until the end of the part where you set your pick intent.

I have the exact same problem with you as well, except I have a black champ select screen for a full minute, causing me to dodge many of my games unintentionally. This didn't happen to me last patch either.
 Also using the new client
